last_episode_to_air.name: Tomorrow's Answers
last_episode_to_air.overview: While a second wave of rumors about Ha-kyung and Si-woo spreads around work, those around them urge them to reconsider the status of their relationship.

name: Forecasting Love and Weather
overview: Inside a national weather service, love proves just as difficult to predict as rain or shine for a diligent forecaster and her free-spirited co-worker.

episodes.name: Signal
episodes.overview: While preparing for her wedding, Jin Ha-kyung deals with work headaches as Lee Si-woo refuses to give up on signals that point to an oncoming storm.

episodes.name: Sensible Temperature
episodes.overview: Han Ki-jun's shameless requests infuriate Ha-kyung, who considers an overseas job opportunity. Si-woo shows up at the office on a two-week assignment.

episodes.name: In Between Seasons
episodes.overview: A drunken encounter with Si-woo leaves Ha-kyung uncharacteristically disoriented. At work, her public clashes with Ki-jun continue.

episodes.name: Visibility
episodes.overview: Si-woo's co-workers notice that he seems to have gotten on Ha-kyung's bad side. Chae Yu-jin writes a newspaper article criticizing the weather service.

episodes.name: Localized Heavy Rain
episodes.overview: Ki-jun finds it difficult to let go of Yu-jin's lie. Unrest grows within Ha-kyung's team, and Um Dong-han struggles to focus at work.

episodes.name: Heat Island Phenomenon
episodes.overview: Ha-kyung grows wary of Si-woo's secrets after running into him at a motel. News about her mother sends her hurrying to the hospital.

episodes.name: Ozone Warning
episodes.overview: After an uneasy conversation with Yu-jin, Ki-jun seeks sage advice. While looking for a place to crash, Si-woo finds someone else in need of a home.

episodes.name: Discomfort Index
episodes.overview: As temperatures boil over outside, so do emotions as another uncovered truth pushes the animosity between Si-woo and Ki-jun to new heights.

episodes.name: Dry Changma (Rainy Season)
episodes.overview: Bothered to no end by the sight of Ha-kyung and Si-woo together, Ki-jun tails them on their day off. Meanwhile, Yu-jin's frustration balloons.

episodes.name: Tropical Night
episodes.overview: Ha-kyung faces intensifying pressure from her mother to get married. A pesky reporter lurks around the office in search of a good story.
When Ha-kyung chooses to send Si-woo far away on assignment, he doesn't hide his displeasure. Dong-han is elated when his daughter returns to see him.

episodes.name: Variation Area
episodes.overview: Upon learning Si-woo's sustained an injury while working, his father causes a scene at the office. Ki-jun can't get a hold of Yu-jin.

episodes.name: Scenario 1, 2, 3
episodes.overview: Relationship troubles abound as Ha-kyung tries to process what Si-woo wants, and Ki-jun and Dong-han set out to save their respective marriages.

episodes.name: Migratory Anticyclone
episodes.overview: Gossip about Ha-kyung and Si-woo dating sets the office abuzz, much to their chagrin. Yu-jin is unable to celebrate being handed a coveted assignment

episodes.name: Ensemble
episodes.overview: Ha-kyung is asked to keep a secret, Yu-jin grapples with a life-altering decision and Dong-han tries to make it to his daughter's birthday dinner.

episodes.name: Tomorrow's Answers
episodes.overview: While a second wave of rumors about Ha-kyung and Si-woo spreads around work, those around them urge them to reconsider the status of their relationship.
